articles.title: ESA mulls Solaris plan to beam solar energy from space - BBC
articles.description: The European Space Agency is considering the 'Solaris Initiative' plan to collect solar energy in orbit and beam electricity back to Earth.
articles.content:
Space chiefs are to investigate whether electricity could be beamed wirelessly from space into millions of homes.
The European Space Agency will this week likely approve a three-year study to see if… [+5032 chars]

articles.title: NASA's Orion space capsule reaches the moon - marking the first time in 50 years - Sky News
articles.content:

articles.title: Scientists discover something 5million square km wide may be living beneath Antarctica - The Mirror
articles.description: Scientists have said that this new research is important as it "introduces important new questions about the food webs that might lie under the ice in Antarctica"
articles.content:

articles.title: Hybrid solar eclipse: What is it and how does it occur? - Space.com
articles.description: Not all solar eclipses are the same, but a hybrid event occurs just once every decade — and there's one coming in 2023.
articles.content:
A hybrid solar eclipse is a very rare and strange astronomical event — and there's one coming soon on April 20, 2023.
